contact_page.hero_text: If you’re interested in my work, you can contact me using the links below:

job1.title: junior front-end developer
job1.description: I contributed to the development of a web application with a focus on UI implementation and styling using Bootstrap. I created and managed both internal and client websites in Webflow. I performed manual testing, including bug identification and reporting. Later, I also took on part of the project management responsibilities, such as sprint planning, task assignment, and overseeing task completion.

job2.title: react typescript developer
job2.description: I contributed to the development of the front-end interface for security systems in the military sector. I developed new features using React and TypeScript and created components with Material UI.

project1.project_description: A presentation website for the construction company SESTAV HB s.r.o., featuring a project gallery built with the PhotoSwipe library. The project also included domain management, hosting, and SEO optimization.

project2.project_description: The application allows users to record income and expenses, filter, edit, delete, and manage them using various features. All data is stored and handled through a Firebase database.

project3.project_description: A weather application that displays current conditions. The homepage shows weather data for five major cities, and a second page allows users to enter any location worldwide and retrieve real-time information via an API.

error_page.error_text: This corner of the website is empty.
